html.p: In this recitation we will explore induction. You may have noticed that the book and lectures have defined natural numbers starting from `1`. In contrast, the Lean MathLib nats start at `0`. That's ok, we can work around it!
But, no need to worry, we'll clear up these differences as they arise.
Beyond working with the built in induction tactic, first we'll implement induction from scratch without the tactic, starting on the next page. So, put on your recursion hat!
